blog.name: cherop
blog.title: whichever 'me' I am today
blog.description:
thirty-some-odd year old gov't finance wonk in boston, massachusetts. she/her/hers.

a personal blog to complement my mostly-abandoned photography blog (www.ninaitwa.tumblr.com) for my reblogs, ramblings, worthy news, book reviews, beautiful people, fandom and fanfic, and random things that strike my fancy. 

this blog 'follows' and 'likes' as ninaitwa.

Not that it's a competition but I love him 3000. (previously tonesbeforestones)
Sravya | Mumbai/NZ | Full time procrastinator | Marvel and Taylor Swift | Fries and Tony Stark are life.

summary:
Twinkle Twinkle Lil Star foreshadowed Tony in space and that's the tea. 
I can't believe school was preparing us for this moment...
body:
Twinkle Twinkle Lil Star foreshadowed Tony in space and that’s the tea.

I can’t believe school was preparing us for this moment ever since we were little. I mean, it did fail spectacularly cuz we ain’t prepared one bit.

blog.name: fictional-downey
blog.title: Fictional Downey
blog.description: Hi! Welcome to my Robert Downey Jr. fanfiction blog! I'm a HUGE fan of RDJ (and not just since he took on the role of Iron Man I've loved him for YEARS). Yes, I know there is TONS of fanfiction out there and mine isn't anything special, but I'm posting anyway ;-). I'll post chapter by chapter, BUT also have all the finished chapters posted under the "The Stories" link below. Feedback is appreciated - even POLITE criticism. Have fun (and yes, there are ADULT chapters)!

summary:
Tony: I should probably tell people how I feel. 
Tony: it can't be healthy keeping it all bottled up.
Tony: I need to open up to...
body:
Tony: I should probably tell people how I feel.

Tony: it can’t be healthy keeping it all bottled up.

Tony: I need to open up to somebody.

Stephen: hey, how are you feeling?

Tony: I AM ABSOLUTELY FINE WHY ARE YOU ASKING?!

blog.name: starker-obsession

blog.description: This is a side-blog which feeds my intense Starker obsession. Hannah/25/England/ my main is: asiriuscrushonmoony

summary: Hi here I am with a prompt. Imagine Peter as an employee in a high end flower shop. He is all sweet and knows tons about flowers...
question: Hi here I am with a prompt. Imagine Peter as an employee in a high end flower shop. He is all sweet and knows tons about flowers and makes beautiful bouquets. Tony comes in really hurried because he is late to a friend date with Pepper (again) or something and wants to get her something to say sorry.  He was going to just grab some roses when he notices Peter making a bouquet. Naturally he has to tall to this pretty boy. Flirting probably ensues.
answer:
Hello! Thanks so much for this prompt, and I’m sorry it’s taken so long!  I’m just gonna post these prompts HC style, because I’m not really in the writing mood right now.  So anyway, I hope you like this cheesy lil’ bit of fluff.

  • Tony is late again and he already feels terrible.  It’s the fifth time in a row he’s running late meeting Pepper and he doesn’t want it to seem like since they broke up he doesn’t care anymore.

  • He asks Happy to stop the car when he spots an elegant little flower shop on the corner of the block.

  • Flowers, he thinks.  It’ll have to do.

  • “I’ll be five minutes max,” he tells Happy as he jumps out of the car and heads into the flower shop.

  • It’s not too busy inside, and as soon as Tony enters his nostrils are assaulted by the strong smell of plant.

  • He isn’t really much of a plant or flower person, but he knows he has to do something to make up for being late again.

  • He walks around for a bit, conscious of the time, and finally settles on grabbing the nearest bouquet of red roses he can find.

  • He gets to the counter to pay for his flowers, and he is met with the most gorgeous deep brown eyes he has ever seen.

  • It takes him aback; fuck this boy is pretty.

  • The cashier - Peter, as his name badge suggests - is making up a bouquet of flowers, and Tony stares at how his slender fingers move so expertly, how his hands are so steady, how his-

  • “Hello, Sir.  How can I help you today?” Peter asks brightly, breaking Tony out of his staring.

  • Tony wants to get to know him.  No, he needs to.  He eyes Peter up and down and smiles charmingly.  “The bouquet you just made up.  Is it for sale?”

  • Peter glances from Tony to his newly-made bouquet and smiles.  “Yeah,” he says.  “Sure.  It’s $15.”

  • Tony hums and nods.  “I’ll take them.  And these,” he says, placing the roses on the counter.

  • “Of course, Sir,” Peter says, keying things into the till and then carefully picking up his hand-made bouquet and placing it on the counter for Tony.  “Very lucky someone you’ve got at home.”

  • “Oh yeah,” Tony agrees.  “Very lucky.”

  • “That’ll be 24.99 altogether,” Peter says, smiling so sweetly at Tony that Tony thinks his heart might explode.

  • Tony pulls out a 50 dollar bill and hands it to Peter.  “Keep the change,” he says softly. 

  • Peter stares at Tony in shock, which makes Tony smile.  Just as Peter’s about to protest, Tony puts his hand up and cuts in.  “Please, Peter,” he says, watching the boy blush at the use of his name.  “Keep the change.  For the effort of having to make the bouquet.”

  • “Th-thank you.  That’s really nice of you, Sir,” Peter says, cheeks still rosy.  “Let me get your receipt.”

  • “Of course.”

  • When Peter hands the receipt to Tony, Tony pulls a pen out of the pocket of his suit and writes his phone number down on the paper.  He then takes the roses in one hand and slides Peter’s bouquet back across the counter towards Peter.

  • “For you,” Tony grins.  “The most beautiful flowers I’ve ever seen for the most beautiful man I’ve ever seen.”  He slides the receipt across to a blushing, stuttering Peter and winks.  “And now you’ve got my number.  Your move.”

  • “Sir, I-”

  • “-Call me Tony.  Tony Stark,” Tony says with a smile.  “It was lovely meeting you, Peter.  I hope to hear from you soon?” With that, Tony walks towards the door of the shop, feeling thoroughly elated.

  • “Yes, Mr Stark.  You- You will!” he hears Peter call after him.  

  • All in all, a pretty successful day.  And a good reason to be late.

blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Miss Stark
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2BVkpQM

by ZanellBlack

Tony’s niece arrives to the Tower and he tries to know why. Little by little she starts to feel at home and this is the story of how she interacts with the Avengers.

Words: 886, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: take my hand, take my whole life too
title: take my hand, take my whole life too
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Ek3pnG

by FreyaS

Tony Stark Bingo 2019 fill - square R1: hand holding
—

Tony stands in front of the mirror and nervously adjusts the cuffs of his bespoke suit. He fiddles with the cufflinks shaped like the atoms of the element he created (a present from Rhodey for his forty-something birthday) and tries to breathe in slowly and calm his nerves. This is his fifth and probably last date with Steve and he wants to commemorate the moment with his most polished look. The suit is his armor and it’ll carry him through to the bitter end.

Words: 3462, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Tony Stark, Steve Rogers
  • Relationships: Steve Rogers/Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Asexual Character, Asexuality, Relationship Negotiation, Established Relationship, Light Angst, Insecurity, Fluff, Holding Hands, Kissing, Love Confessions, Non-Sexual Intimacy, Dating


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Ek3pnG

Tony stands in front of the mirror and nervously adjusts the cuffs of his bespoke suit. He fiddles with the cufflinks shaped like the atoms of the element he created (a present from Rhodey for his forty-something birthday) and tries to breathe in slowly and calm his nerves. This is his fifth and probably last date with Steve and he wants to commemorate the moment with his most polished look. The suit is his armor and it’ll carry him through to the bitter end.

summary:
Steve, barging into Tony's room: Hey Stark, can I borrow your car, mine broke down
Tony, stressing tf out: I swear if anyone...
body:
Steve, barging into Tony’s room: Hey Stark, can I borrow your car, mine broke down

Tony, stressing tf out: I swear if anyone else asks me for something again today, I’m gonna explode

Peter: hey mr. stark can i have 5 million dollars to scientifically test whether or not i can eat a full, uncracked egg

Tony, taking out his credit card: of course kid, anything for you!!!! :)))

summary: So that short fic I mentioned this morning? here it is! Miracles Are Built From Scraps Starts immediately after the first...
body:
So that short fic I mentioned this morning? here it is!

Miracles Are Built From Scraps

Starts immediately after the first Endgame trailer, and sets up the second (even though we don’t know that they happen in that order, for purposes of this story, they do.) After Tony leaves his farewell message for Pepper aboard the Benatar, he drifts into a daze and has a strange encounter.

“Anthony.”

“Shut UP, brain, lemme die in peace—” He opened his eyes in annoyance. A humanoid form stood before him, limned by a faint but unmistakable glow that surrounded its body—his? Her? There was a softness to the face looking down at him that seemed feminine, but the lean muscles were defined and solid, so he decided on they. Weary curiosity at the apparition washed away the next moment when he noticed the glow extended from the figure’s back, outstretched past the shoulders, almost like—

“Fuck,” Tony croaked. “An angel. My atheist brain in its infinite wisdom has decided to present me with a hallucination of a fucking angel.”

body:
Story: Pepper Potts to the Rescue

Finally updated!

Pepper Potts to the Rescue Chapter 24, an ironman fanfic | FanFiction

Summary: It is the night of Tony and Pepper’s engagement party, and Pepper is supposed to be having the time of her life, but things are not going her way. When Tony needs her help, will she be able to step up and save him? Movie-verse set after “Spiderman: Homecoming” but before Avengers: Infinity War. A/U

summary: Amen to your last post! But woah, in what storyline does Tony Stark sic a bunch of super villains on our beleaguered hero? What...
question: Amen to your last post! But woah, in what storyline does Tony Stark sic a bunch of super villains on our beleaguered hero? What happened there?!
answer:
Canon 616 – Civil War. Peter initially joins Tony’s side of the war (which, btw was a full fledged war, not an argument as seen in the movies) only to later switch sides after registering under the superhero registration act, and thus having to reveal his identity to the world. It f@cks up his life and he realizes he made a mistake. Tony isn’t happy about him switching sides and they both battle it out. Tony later sends some bad guys out to hurt him. He’s nearly beaten to death and only saved by the Punisher, who takes him back to Captain America and his hiding place for treatment.

It’s worth noting Tony Stark is really the asshole in this storyline as opposed to the movies where Steve is made out to be the bad guy. Honestly? Just my opinion – Tony Stark is really an ass in all the comics. It’s cool if you like him and disagree, I just could never get into him with how they write his personality. RDJ really brought empathy to the character.

Feel free to ask any other Spidey questions, I’m a walking encyclopedia, lol.
